299375.「この場所で いのるとは……君は パラディン？\n それとも……ガーディアン志望:
To pray in this place... are you a paladin?
Or...are you an aspiring Guardian?

299376.「おっと！ これは失礼しました。\n 僕は 守護騎士団に属する ガーディアンです:
Oops! I apologize for this. I am a Guardian
belonging to the Guardians. And you are...?

299377.「やはり ガーディアンへの転職希望者でしたか。\n 君の背中は 多くの戦いを経験:
I knew you wanted to work for Guardian. Your
back was that of someone who has been through
many battles.

299378.「ガーディアンは 『牙持つ盾』とも呼ばれ……\n 戦士の攻撃力と パラディンの守:
The Guardian, also known as "Fanged Shield Guardian," is a powerful vocation that combines the offensive capabilities of a
warrior with the defense of a paladin.

299379.「しかし 人は往々にして チカラに\n おぼれてしまう……。だから 守護騎士団で:
But people often get carried away with their
power, and that's why the Guardians pray here
as part of their initiation ceremony.

299380.「ガーディアンの本分は 守ること。\n 我々の牙は 守るためにあるのだと……\n:
The Guardian's duty is to protect. Our fangs
are there to protect... to keep that in our
hearts.

299381.「<pc>君。\n 君が 守りたいと願う相手は 誰ですか？\n<select_n:
<pc>. Who is it that you wish to
protect?
<select_nc>
Family
Lover
Friend
None in Particular
<select_end>
<close>

299382.「家族……家族は いいものです。\n きっと 君も 君の家族も\n あたたかく:
Family...family is good. I am sure you and
your family are warm and wonderful people.

299383.「ふふふ……若いとは すばらしいですね。\n ぜひ 君の愛する人を 守ってあげて:
Hmmm...it's wonderful to be young. By all
means, protect your loved ones.

299384.「命を賭して守りたいと思う 友人……。\n 人生において それを得られる者は\n:
A friend you would risk your life to
protect... not many people get that in their
lives. It's a wonderful thing.

299385.「君は 特別な誰か ではなく\n 見知らぬ誰かを守るために 戦えるのですね。\n:
You are willing to fight not for someone
special, but for someone you don't even know.
What a noble aspiration.

299386.「かく言う僕は 天涯孤独の身ですが……\n 世界を守る ガーディアンであることを:
I, on the other hand, am a loner, but I am
proud to be a Guardian of the world.

299387.「ぜひ <pc>君にも ガーディアンに……\n 僕たちの仲間に くわわってほしい:
I would love to see <pc> added to the
Guardian...as one of our companions.

299388.「おっと……すっかり引き留めてしまいましたね。\n 僕も 用事の途中で 立ち寄っ:
Oops...I totally held you back. I just stopped
by on my way to run some errands, but I have
to go soon.

299389.「<pc>君は 儀式が終わったことを\n 守護騎士団に 報告にいくのでしょう？\:
<pc> is going to report to the
Guardians that the ceremony is over, right? Be
careful back there.

299390.「それでは。\n また会える日を 楽しみにしています。:
See you soon. I look forward to seeing you
again.
